QuestData.Title: The Hermit
QuestData.Description: I've been told there's signs of activity at Beggar's Haunt. People have reported seeing lights in the tower to the east of town.$B$BFew would be bold enough to stay that close to Deadwind Pass. You're the first to report since I've learned about this; go check it out and make sure whatever's in there is human.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the denizen of the tower at Beggar's Haunt.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, welcome, stranger. I'd offer you something, but there's not much here...$B$BCould I beg you to run some errands for a poor old hermit?
